## Project Description

The Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) is seeking proposals from contractors interested in providing all necessary materials, labor, and equipment for the installation of a window replacement project at Building 2B of the Shirleys Bay campus.

The project Scope includes:

* Installation of new windows at Building 2B
* Compliance with specifications and supplemental instructions as outlined in the attached documents
* Work will be undertaken on the national capital region (NCR) specifically at the Communications Research Centre (CRC) campus, located at 3701 Carling Avenue, Ottawa, ON.

## Mandatory Site Visit

A mandatory site visit is scheduled for November 15, 2022, at 10:00 a.m. (EST) at the CRC Campus. Bidders are required to attend this meeting as it is a mandatory portion of the tender submission process.

To confirm attendance, bidders must email crcbidreceiving-receptiondesoffrescrc@ised-isde.gc.ca no later than one (1) business day prior to the site visit.

**Important Information**

* Bidders must provide photo identification to access to the CRC campus
* To ensure COVID-19 safety measures, bidders must receive instructions on signing in and entering the campus
